page.title: 16CARRS GREEN COMMON
page.content: The green,owned by the Parish council is 56 acres of unfenced marsh. Preston Rd runs through the centre and Woods lane along the east side. A number of local tenants have grazing rights and 2 attempts have been made by the council to fence the land but this has had opposition. Travelling caravans and gypsies use the green and it is crossed by 2 public footpaths.A tank trap wich resembles a brook,was dug in 1939 to stop enemy tanks.The green is very wet in places and covered in rushes and willow trees of a great age.Blackberry bushes wild flowers birds and animals are very plentiful.
